H0.text: Name the ballet dancer who requested asylum in France while in Paris with the Kirov Ballet, in June 1961. Rudolf Nureyev's contemporary, Yuri Soloviev

H1.text: Name the ballet dancer who requested asylum in France while in Paris with the Kirov Ballet, in June 1961. Russian ballet dancer, Natalia Makarova

H2.text: Name the ballet dancer who requested asylum in France while in Paris with the Kirov Ballet, in June 1961. Soviet ballet dancer, Maya Plisetskaya

H3.text: Name the ballet dancer who requested asylum in France while in Paris with the Kirov Ballet, in June 1961. Nuriev
